summary: Frontend testing completed successfully for ServiceManager app. All requested features verified: 1072 customers imported from Excel, customer list displays all required columns (An.nr, Knr, Kundenavn, Adresse, Type, Telefon), expandable customer view shows ALL 18+ fields including Kommentar and Kundeinfo in colored boxes, route planner shows customer names/addresses, and print travel note (kjøreseddel) includes ALL customer fields.
critical_code_review_comments: Customers.js: Excellent implementation with expandable rows showing all 18+ fields, Kundeinfo (yellow box) and Kommentar (red box) displayed conditionally
Routes.js: handlePrintTravelNote function correctly generates comprehensive print document with all customer fields
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Search functionality works across multiple fields (name, anleggsnr, postnr, poststed, kommune, adresse, typenavn)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. 1072 customers imported. Customer expandable view shows all fields. Route for 6.1.2026 has 6 customers with real data. Print travel note includes all fields with Kundeinfo/Kommentar boxes.

customer_list_columns.adresse: PASS - Full address with postnr and poststed

customer_expandable_view.all_18_fields: PASS - An.nr, Knr, Kunde, Type nr, Type navn, Kommune, Adresse, Postnr, Sted, Service intervall, Uke, Serviceansvarlig, Tlf 1, Tlf 2, Epost, Startdato, Styreenhet, Tjeneste nr
customer_expandable_view.kundeinfo_box: PASS - Yellow box displayed when value exists
customer_expandable_view.kommentar_box: PASS - Red box displayed when value exists

print_travel_note.opens_print_window: PASS - Opens new window with formatted content
print_travel_note.all_fields_included: PASS - Type nr, Type navn, Styreenhet, Serviceansvarlig, Kommune, Service-intervall, Tlf 1, Tlf 2, Epost, Uke, Startdato, Kundeinfo, Kommentar
print_travel_note.kommentar_box_in_print: PASS - Red background box labeled 'Kommentar / Adgangsinformasjon'
